<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Persona Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3099)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 293 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Despite covering the entire face, this alabaster mask does not hinder vision or other senses. Wearing the mask grants a +1 item bonus to Performance checks while acting, orating, performing comedy, or singing. 

**Activate—Assume Role** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))    **Effect** You change the mask's appearance into an artistic rendition of a dramatic character of your choice.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Persona Mask
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 293 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Persona Mask (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 293 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 613 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The mask grants a +2 bonus and gains another activation. 

**Activate—Sacrifice Role** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76))
 **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail a Performance check that benefits from the mask's bonus;  **Effect** You change the mask's character and reroll the Performance check, using the second result.
